Package fchen

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Benchmark
    This class measure the performance of our verifiable file search algorithm on a certain directory.
    CorrectnessCheck
    It checks the correctness of the protocol.
    HashTree
    This class implements the hash authentication tree primitive.
    HashTreeBasedOutsourcing
    This class implements the protocol of verifiable encrypted file search on a cloud.
    MetaProofData
    This class encapsulates the tuple (index, filename, authentication path) and some corresponding methods.
    PerformanceEvaluate
    It evaluates the performance of the hash tree based algorithm implemented in this project.
    ProofData
    This class encapsulates the search result returned by the cloud, together with its correctness proof.
